title: Web sense
data:
{{obsolete}}

Monsters with the '''Web sense''' flag are alerted any time a [[web]] trap within 10 tiles of them successfully catches the player,<ref>{{source ref|0.25.0|traps.cc|745}}</ref> and they may start wandering toward the origin of the disturbance.<ref>{{source ref|0.25.0|shout.cc|886}}</ref>

==See also==

[[:Category:Web sense|List of monsters with this flag]]

==History==
*Web sense was removed in [[0.26]].
